program combined

  implicit none

  integer :: t, a, b, c, count1, count_ones, i, len_s, pos, cnt, tmp, len_mod
  character(len=20) :: s, s_mod

  ! First part: compute count1
  read(*,*) t
  count1 = 0
  do i = 1, t
     read(*,*) a, b, c
     count_ones = 0
     if (a == 1) count_ones = count_ones +1
     if (b == 1) count_ones = count_ones +1
     if (c == 1) count_ones = count_ones +1
     if (count_ones >= 2) then
        count1 = count1 +1
     end if
  end do

  ! Convert count1 to string s
  write(s, '(i0)') count1

  ! Process s to replace "BC" with "D" to get s_mod

  pos = 1
  len_s = len_trim(s)
  do i = 1, len_s
     if (i < len_s .and. s(i:i+1) == 'BC') then
        s_mod(pos:pos) = 'D'
        pos = pos +1
        i = i +1
     else
        s_mod(pos:pos) = s(i:i)
        pos = pos +1
     end if
  end do

  ! Process s_mod to compute cnt
  cnt = 0
  tmp = 0
  len_mod = len_trim(s_mod)
  do i = 1, len_mod
     if (s_mod(i:i) == 'A') then
        tmp = tmp +1
     else if (s_mod(i:i) == 'D') then
        cnt = cnt + tmp
     else
        tmp = 0
     end if
  end do

  ! Output the result
  print *, cnt

end program combined

program combined

  implicit none

  integer :: t, a, b, c, count1, count_ones, i, len_s, j, pos, cnt, tmp, len_mod
  character(len=20) :: s, s_mod

  ! First part: compute count1
  read(*,*) t
  count1 = 0
  do i = 1, t
     read(*,*) a, b, c
     count_ones = 0
     if (a == 1) count_ones = count_ones +1
     if (b == 1) count_ones = count_ones +1
     if (c == 1) count_ones = count_ones +1
     if (count_ones >= 2) then
        count1 = count1 +1
     end if
  end do

  ! Convert count1 to string s
  write(s, '(i0)') count1

  ! Process s to replace "BC" with "D" to get s_mod
  s_mod = ''
  pos = 1
  len_s = len_trim(s)
  j = 1

  do while (j <= len_s)
     if (j < len_s .and. s(j:j+1) == 'BC') then
        s_mod(pos:pos) = 'D'
        pos = pos +1
        j = j +2
     else
        s_mod(pos:pos) = s(j:j)
        pos = pos +1
        j = j +1
     end if
  end do

  ! Process s_mod to compute cnt
  cnt = 0
  tmp = 0
  len_mod = len_trim(s_mod)
  do i = 1, len_mod
     if (s_mod(i:i) == 'A') then
        tmp = tmp +1
     else if (s_mod(i:i) == 'D') then
        cnt = cnt + tmp
     else
        tmp = 0
     end if
  end do

  ! Output the result
  print *, cnt

end program combined
